message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Could you consider a price closer to that?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Can we discuss this further?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I can do $108. It's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I've already offered $108, and you've come back with $105. I'm not willing to go back to $105. I'll meet you in the middle at $106.5. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $104?
I've already made a concession to $106.5, and you're asking me to go down to $104. I'm not willing to go that low. I'll meet you at $106, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm really close to my budget. I'll meet you at $105.5. This is my final offer.
